biotools.summary: Uses a motif-based regression method for the identification of TFBS (transcription factor binding sites) from microarray data in yeast, worm and fly. A free registration is required.

bioschemas.name: REDUCE
bioschemas.summary: Uses a motif-based regression method for the identification of TFBS (transcription factor binding sites) from microarray data in yeast, worm and fly. A free registration is required.
